page.title: 09Recreation, Employment
page.content:
{Recreation }A Keep Fit ( Adult Education) class for women is held on Tuesday 1.30 pm at kirton Church hall Creche available. Needlework (Adult Education) Class is held on Thurs at 0930 am at Kirton Church Hall.
{Employment} There is little employment opportunity in the area. few farm labourers are needed. Most of the working population commute to British Telecom at Martlesham, Customs and Excise and other jobs at Felixstowe Docks, or Felixstowe Town. Norsk Hydro at Levington and to Woodbridge and Ipswich. An Antique dealer operates from his home at Falkenham. The Post Office and general Stores employ.
